Title: Common Divisors
Description: You are given an array of n positive integers. Your task is to find two integers such that their greatest common divisor is as large as possible.
Input Specification:
The first input line has an integer n: the size of the array. 
 The second line has n integers x_1,x_2,\ldots,x_n: the contents of the array.
Output Specification: Print the maximum greatest common divisor.
